articles.title: Major study reveals genetic causes of severe developmental disorders - The Guardian
articles.description: Genome sequencing of children with rare conditions should improve speed and accuracy of NHS diagnoses
articles.content:
About 5,500 people with severe developmental disorders now know the genetic cause of their condition thanks to a major study that will be used to improve the speed and accuracy of NHS diagnoses.
